Package cycling

Class Stage

java.lang.Object
cycling.Entity
cycling.Stage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Stage extends Entity
Class to represent a stage in the staged bike race
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Stage

      public Stage(String name, String description, StageType type, double length, LocalDateTime startTime, Race parentRace) throws InvalidNameException, InvalidLengthException
      Constructor for the Stage class.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the stage
      description - Description of the stage
      type - The type of the stage
      length - The length of the stage
      startTime - The time the stage starts
      parentRace - The parent race that this stage belongs to
      Throws:
      InvalidNameException - if the name is not between 0 and 30 chars or contains whitespace
      InvalidLengthException - if the length is less than 5km

  • Method Details

    • getParentRace

      public Race getParentRace()
      Getter for the parent race this stage belongs to
      Returns:
      the race Id

    • registerResults

      public void registerResults(int riderId, LocalTime... times) throws DuplicatedResultException, InvalidCheckpointTimesException, InvalidStageStateException
      Register a rider's results at each checkpoint.
      Parameters:
      riderId - the ID of the rider
      times - an array of times in the form [start, checkpoint1, checkpoint2, ..., finish]
      Throws:
      DuplicatedResultException - if the rider has already registered a result
      InvalidCheckpointTimesException - if the number of times given â‰  the number of checkpoints + 2
      InvalidStageStateException - if the stage is not fully set up

    • addCheckpoint

      public void addCheckpoint(Checkpoint checkpoint)
      Adds a checkpoint to the stage.
      Parameters:
      checkpoint - the checkpoint object to add

    • getSprintPoints

      public int getSprintPoints(int riderId) throws IDNotRecognisedException
      Get the sprint points for a rider. Sprint points are calculated based on the rider's position at the end of the stage and the type of stage. Sprint points from checkpoints are added to this.
      Parameters:
      riderId - the ID of the rider to calculate the sprint points for
      Returns:
      the number of sprint points the rider gets for this stage
      Throws:
      IDNotRecognisedException - if the rider ID is not recognised

    • getRidersSprintPoints

      public int[] getRidersSprintPoints(int[] orderedRiders) throws IDNotRecognisedException
      Get the sprint points for an array of riders.
      Parameters:
      orderedRiders - the array of riders to calculate the sprint points for.
      Returns:
      an array of the number of sprint points each rider gets for this stage.
      Throws:
      IDNotRecognisedException - if a rider ID is not recognised.

    • getMountainPoints

      public int getMountainPoints(int riderId) throws IDNotRecognisedException
      Get the mountain points for a rider. Mountain points are calculated based on the rider's position at the end of each mountain checkpoint.
      Parameters:
      riderId - the ID of the rider to calculate the mountain points for
      Returns:
      the number of mountain points the rider gets for this stage
      Throws:
      IDNotRecognisedException - if the rider ID is not recognised

    • concludePreparation

      public void concludePreparation() throws InvalidStageStateException
      Conclude the preparation of the stage.
      Throws:
      InvalidStageStateException - if the stage is already prepared

    • removeCheckpoint

      public void removeCheckpoint(int checkpointId) throws InvalidStageStateException
      Remove a checkpoint from the stage's list of checkpoints.
      Parameters:
      checkpointId - the ID of the checkpoint to remove
      Throws:
      InvalidStageStateException - if the stage is already prepared

    • removeRider

      public void removeRider(int riderId) throws IDNotRecognisedException
      Removes all of a rider's results from the stage and its checkpoints.
      Parameters:
      riderId - the ID of the rider to remove
      Throws:
      IDNotRecognisedException - if the rider ID is not recognised

    • remove

      public void remove()
      Description copied from class: Entity
      Abstract method to be implemented by subclasses to delete the entity. Should remove the entity from any parents and delete any children.
      Specified by:
      remove in class Entity

    • getAdjustedElapsedTime

      public LocalTime getAdjustedElapsedTime(int riderId) throws IDNotRecognisedException
      Gets a rider's adjusted elapsed time for the stage. Adjusted time recursively gives riders that finish within 1 second of each other the same time.
      Parameters:
      riderId - the ID of the rider to get the adjusted time for
      Returns:
      the adjusted time
      Throws:
      IDNotRecognisedException - if the rider ID is not recognised

    • getResults

      public LocalTime[] getResults(int riderId) throws IDNotRecognisedException
      Gets a rider's results for the stage, that is, an array of finish times for each checkpoint and elapsed time.
      Parameters:
      riderId - the ID of the rider to get the results for
      Returns:
      an array in the form [checkpoint1, checkpoint2, ..., finish]
      Throws:
      IDNotRecognisedException - if the rider ID is not recognised

    • getRidersRankInStage

      public int[] getRidersRankInStage()
      Get the riders (as IDs) that are a part of the queried stage ordered by their GC time
      Returns:
      The IDs of the riders sorted by elapsed time

    • getRankedAdjustedElapsedTimesInStage

      public LocalTime[] getRankedAdjustedElapsedTimesInStage()
      Get the adjusted elapsed times of riders in a stage.
      Returns:
      The ranked list of adjusted elapsed times sorted by their finish time.

    • getRidersMountainPoints

      public int[] getRidersMountainPoints(int[] orderedRiders) throws IDNotRecognisedException
      This function returns the mountain points for each rider a given array of riderIds
      Parameters:
      orderedRiders - a list of riderIds which will determine the order of the output array
      Returns:
      an array of mountain points for each rider.
      Throws:
      IDNotRecognisedException - If any of the riders in the input array are not recognised
